total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the pattern of 8s in the input grid.
Q2: Identify the position of 4s in the input grid.
Q3: Determine the relationship between the position of 8s and 4s in the input grid and the output grid.
Q4: Based on the relationship identified in Q3, predict the position of 8s in the output grid.
Q5: Predict the size of the output grid based on the position of 8s and 4s in the input grid.
Q6: Generate the output grid based on the predictions made in Q4 and Q5.
